functions.name: Get holders of Token
functions.description: Returns all holders of a specific token on Binance Smart Chain

args.name: Network
args.description: The network where the Token is located

args.name: TokenAddress
args.description: The contract address of a token.

functions.name: Get holders of NFT
functions.description: Returns all holders of a specific NFT on Binance Smart Chain

args.name: Network
args.description: The network where the NFT is located

args.name: TokenAddress
args.description: The contract address of a NFT.
